content:
Zadnja sprememba: crt 15.08.2022 10:41
"Perhaps the most noteworthy tidbit in the data: China's jobless
rate for those aged 16-24 rose to a record 19.9%. One in five young
adults in the country now don't have jobs as everything from retail
sales to industrial production lags behind expectations."

tu je zanimiva primerjava z evropo. zanimiva je predvsem zaradi
svedske.
